background.text: ORDER BELOW EXH. 1 1. This is an application under Sec. 438 of Cr.P.C. for grant of anticipatory bail. On the basis of the report lodged by Dhananjay Bhujbal C.R.No. 869/2018 under Sec. 307, 143, 147, 148, 149, 323, 504, 506, 324 of I.P.C. with Shikrapur Police Station

arguments.text: 2. It is alleged by informant Dhananjay Bhujbal that on 17.12.2018 at around 15.15 hrs. near R.B.Gujar College, Talegaon Dhamdhere as Kho-Kho Tournament was organized at Talegaon Dhamdhere. While informant along with Prathamesh Phulkaware, Chakradhar Phulaware, Anup Gore were proceeding towards Talegaon Dhamdhere. At the relevant time on account of previous rivalry the accused Rakesh Shelar and Rohan Shelar assaulted informant with wooden log as well as accused Ajay Zhende assaulted by iron pipe on left hand of informant as well as with wooden log to Prathemesh. Accused Lalya Shelar assaulte dChakradhar Phulaware by means of rod and accused Vilas Kolhe by means of stick, as well as accused Prashant Shelar to Anup Gore by means of pipe on knee. In short at the relevant time accused along with 7 to 8 unknown persons illegally gathered along with dangerous weapons like wooden stick, iron pipe, iron rod with intention to kill the informant and others; so also assaulted the informant and other witnesses.

argumentSentences.text: It is alleged by informant Dhananjay Bhujbal that on 17.12.2018 at around 15.15 hrs.
near R.B.Gujar College, Talegaon Dhamdhere as Kho-Kho Tournament was organized at Talegaon Dhamdhere.
While informant along with Prathamesh Phulkaware, Chakradhar Phulaware, Anup Gore were proceeding towards Talegaon Dhamdhere.

At the relevant time on account of previous rivalry the accused Rakesh Shelar and Rohan Shelar assaulted informant with wooden log as well as accused Ajay Zhende assaulted by iron pipe on left hand of informant as well as with wooden log to Prathemesh.
Accused Lalya Shelar assaulte dChakradhar Phulaware by means of rod and accused Vilas Kolhe by means of stick, as well as accused Prashant Shelar to Anup Gore by means of pipe on knee.

In short at the relevant time accused along with 7 to 8 unknown persons illegally gathered along with dangerous weapons like wooden stick, iron pipe, iron rod with intention to kill the informant and others; so also assaulted the informant and other witnesses.

arguments.text: 3. It is further alleged that accused dragged the iformant and Anup Gore from motorcycle and also tried to drive car having registration 12-FU-0131 on informant and Anup Gore's person and abused in filthy language and assaulted informant and Anup Gore and attempted to commit murder.

argumentSentences.text: It is further alleged that accused dragged the iformant and Anup Gore from motorcycle and also tried to drive car having registration 12-FU-0131 on informant and Anup Gore's person and abused in filthy language and assaulted informant and Anup Gore and attempted to commit murder.

arguments.text: 4. By this application applicants contend that F.I.R. is completely vague and there are no specific allegations against these applicants. Even if case of prosecution taken to be true, the offence cannot be made out against the applicants. The applicants are falsely implicated in this crime. Even though informant was not admitted in the hospital. Applicants are falsely implicated in this crime. They are ready to abide the conditions imposed by the court. Thus, applicants prayed for grant of anticipatory bail.

argumentSentences.text: By this application applicants contend that F.I.R. is completely vague and there are no specific allegations against these applicants.
Even if case of prosecution taken to be true, the offence cannot be made out against the applicants.
The applicants are falsely implicated in this crime.
Even though informant was not admitted in the hospital.
Applicants are falsely implicated in this crime.
They are ready to abide the conditions imposed by the court.
Thus, applicants prayed for grant of anticipatory bail.

arguments.text: 5. In response to the show cause notice prosecution filed its say vide Exh. 7 in Bail Appln.No. 5407/2018 thereby denied all adverse allegations and reiterated its case. It is contended that the weapons used in crime and the car are yet to be seized. The absconding accused are to be arrested. Applicants will pressurize the witnesses. Previously there was quarrel between accused and informant, therefore, again there are chances of commission of serious offence. Investigation is in progress. Thus, prosecution prayed for rejection of the application.

argumentSentences.text: In response to the show cause notice prosecution filed its say vide Exh. 7 in Bail Appln.No.
5407/2018 thereby denied all adverse allegations and reiterated its case.
It is contended that the weapons used in crime and the car are yet to be seized.
The absconding accused are to be arrested.
Applicants will pressurize the witnesses.
Previously there was quarrel between accused and informant, therefore, again there are chances of commission of serious offence.
Investigation is in progress.
Thus, prosecution prayed for rejection of the application.

arguments.text: 6. Heard Ld.Counsel for the applicants and Ld.A.P.P. for the State. Perused case diary and all relevant papers. It appears that there are grounds for believing that information is well founded against the accused. Perused statement of the informant and other injured person. It clearly indicates common intention and active role played by the accused with weapons in this crime. Perused injury certificates. It appears that informant and other witnesses had sustained grievous as well simple injuries. It further appears crime weapons and car used in commission of crime are yet to be recovered. Considering conduct and attitude of the accused, custodial interrogation of the applicant accused is necessary. Therefore, I find much substance in the submission of Ld.A.P.P.

argumentSentences.text: Heard Ld.Counsel for the applicants and Ld.A.P.P.
for the State.
Perused case diary and all relevant papers.
It appears that there are grounds for believing that information is well founded against the accused.
Perused statement of the informant and other injured person.
It clearly indicates common intention and active role played by the accused with weapons in this crime.
Perused injury certificates.
It appears that informant and other witnesses had sustained grievous as well simple injuries.
It further appears crime weapons and car used in commission of crime are yet to be recovered.
Considering conduct and attitude of the accused, custodial interrogation of the applicant accused is necessary.
Therefore, I find much substance in the submission of Ld.A.P.P.

arguments.text: 7. Certainly, object of arrest in the present case is not to humiliate the applicants. Bail is rule, however, anticipatory bail is not the rule. It is extra ordinary power of the court to be used springly with circumspection. The matter need thorough investigation and that can be done only by custodial interrogation of the applicant. Therefore, I am inclined to use my discretion in favour of the applicant and pass the following order.

argumentSentences.text: Certainly, object of arrest in the present case is not to humiliate the applicants.
Bail is rule, however, anticipatory bail is not the rule.
It is extra ordinary power of the court to be used springly with circumspection.
The matter need thorough investigation and that can be done only by custodial interrogation of the applicant.
Therefore, I am inclined to use my discretion in favour of the applicant and pass the following order.

order.text: O R D E R 1. Cri.Bail Appln No. 104/2019 is hereby rejected. 2. Inform the concern police station accordingly.

footer: ( S. H. Gwalani ) Dt. : 11.01.2019 Additional Sessions Judge, Pune.
processedText:
Bail Appln.No. 104/2019 CNR-MHPU01-000449-2019 
---header-ends---
ORDER BELOW EXH. 1 1. This is an application under Sec. 438 of Cr.P.C. for grant of anticipatory bail. On the basis of the report lodged by Dhananjay Bhujbal C.R.No. 869/2018 under Sec. 307, 143, 147, 148, 149, 323, 504, 506, 324 of I.P.C. with Shikrapur Police Station 
---background-ends---
2. It is alleged by informant Dhananjay Bhujbal that on 17.12.2018 at around 15.15 hrs. near R.B.Gujar College, Talegaon Dhamdhere as Kho-Kho Tournament was organized at Talegaon Dhamdhere. While informant along with Prathamesh Phulkaware, Chakradhar Phulaware, Anup Gore were proceeding towards Talegaon Dhamdhere. At the relevant time on account of previous rivalry the accused Rakesh Shelar and Rohan Shelar assaulted informant with wooden log as well as accused Ajay Zhende assaulted by iron pipe on left hand of informant as well as with wooden log to Prathemesh. Accused Lalya Shelar assaulte dChakradhar Phulaware by means of rod and accused Vilas Kolhe by means of stick, as well as accused Prashant Shelar to Anup Gore by means of pipe on knee. In short at the relevant time accused along with 7 to 8 unknown persons illegally gathered along with dangerous weapons like wooden stick, iron pipe, iron rod with intention to kill the informant and others; so also assaulted the informant and other witnesses. 
---argument-ends---
3. It is further alleged that accused dragged the iformant and Anup Gore from motorcycle and also tried to drive car having registration 12-FU-0131 on informant and Anup Gore's person and abused in filthy language and assaulted informant and Anup Gore and attempted to commit murder. 
---argument-ends---
4. By this application applicants contend that F.I.R. is completely vague and there are no specific allegations against these applicants. Even if case of prosecution taken to be true, the offence cannot be made out against the applicants. The applicants are falsely implicated in this crime. Even though informant was not admitted in the hospital. Applicants are falsely implicated in this crime. They are ready to abide the conditions imposed by the court. Thus, applicants prayed for grant of anticipatory bail. 
---argument-ends---
5. In response to the show cause notice prosecution filed its say vide Exh. 7 in Bail Appln.No. 5407/2018 thereby denied all adverse allegations and reiterated its case. It is contended that the weapons used in crime and the car are yet to be seized. The absconding accused are to be arrested. Applicants will pressurize the witnesses. Previously there was quarrel between accused and informant, therefore, again there are chances of commission of serious offence. Investigation is in progress. Thus, prosecution prayed for rejection of the application. 
---argument-ends---
6. Heard Ld.Counsel for the applicants and Ld.A.P.P. for the State. Perused case diary and all relevant papers. It appears that there are grounds for believing that information is well founded against the accused. Perused statement of the informant and other injured person. It clearly indicates common intention and active role played by the accused with weapons in this crime. Perused injury certificates. It appears that informant and other witnesses had sustained grievous as well simple injuries. It further appears crime weapons and car used in commission of crime are yet to be recovered. Considering conduct and attitude of the accused, custodial interrogation of the applicant accused is necessary. Therefore, I find much substance in the submission of Ld.A.P.P. 
---argument-ends---
7. Certainly, object of arrest in the present case is not to humiliate the applicants. Bail is rule, however, anticipatory bail is not the rule. It is extra ordinary power of the court to be used springly with circumspection. The matter need thorough investigation and that can be done only by custodial interrogation of the applicant. Therefore, I am inclined to use my discretion in favour of the applicant and pass the following order. 
---argument-ends---
O R D E R 1. Cri.Bail Appln No. 104/2019 is hereby rejected. 2. Inform the concern police station accordingly. 
---order-ends---
( S. H. Gwalani ) Dt. : 11.01.2019 Additional Sessions Judge, Pune.
